website_summaries.verdict: Top-of-the-line, overall best cycling shoe to pick when you want a high level of comfort and performance.
pros: Great amount of ventilation over the whole exterior of the shoe
BOA fastener makes fitting the shoe quick and simple
Inner lining is comfortable for longer rides and tours
cons: Narrow profile can feel tight on wider feet

customer_reviews.title: Not for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wider feet in toe box area - these were too tight following my normal sizing is the toe box area. Had to return. If you have normal or narrow feet - you fill love.
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and solid shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes 4 months now, I do indoor spin 2-3 days per week. No pinching, sliding or squeezing. The laces stay put even when unlacing. Wud buy again! Very cute and stylish too, which is why I really bought.
customer_reviews.author: ma honey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT shoes for spin class. Sturdy and comfy they fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Replaced old Giro Esplanade shoes with these. The boa system provides a much better fit that feels custom. I'm using them with a speed play cleat. It's taken a few adjustments to get the cleat where I want it, the markings on the bottom of shoe are a bit lacking but that's a very minor complaint. I rode 150 miles with these shoes out of the box and my feet were very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: In love with this shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with Fizik road shoes! On my first pedal to test it i road 200 kilometers and i do not have any pain or injury im my feet. The shoes is very confortable and light. And there are parts on shoes tht reflects light when you are ridibg at night, give more item for your safety at night ride. I do recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Luciana

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They fit great and my feet have never had a problem. I have gone as far as 80 miles in them on one day and have had no issues. The first time I pit them on, the lip was bothering me and I didnt think I would be able to get past that but after one ride my feet adjusted to them and I wouldnt change them for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Century Approved
customer_reviews.text: Been riding with these shoes for awhile now. I’ve completed a century in them with absolutely no problems. These are good quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Leeper

customer_reviews.title: Feet hurt for a few initial rides as they’re quite hard but I still like that the shoes because they are so light weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes some breaking in. Feet hurt for a few initial rides as they’re quite hard but I still like that the shoes because they are so light weight - just wish they were a bit more flexible
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: First try, I'm hooked.
customer_reviews.text: Love that Fizik. Comfortable, true.to.size fit. Interesting knob on each side that pulls out for easy take off and on and pops back in (manually) then with a couple turns, the wire laces begin to tighten shoe..Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Really stiff
customer_reviews.text: I sized up. Half a size from my usual. They are cute and while I really want to love them, I just cant. They are stiff the my first couple rides in cycling class wearing these really did a number on my toes. They were sore! They are just so stiff and it’s taking a while to break em’ in.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Sun

customer_reviews.title: Italian chic on the bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome shoe, particularly for someone with a narrow foot. I added a Dr. Scholl's sport insert and it is the most comfortable and attractive cycling shoe I have ever owned. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M Watson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable cycle shoe! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cycle shoe. Really comfortable. The BOA system is phenomenal. Pretty stiff sole. Has helped me quite a bit on my upstroke. Super quick shipping. The odd wear on the cleats is completely me. New to this type. I'll learn!
customer_reviews.author: nutsenmai

customer_reviews.title: ... to find the right road shoes and those are awesome. Good for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I shopped a long time to find the right road shoes and those are awesome. Good for narrow feet. Awesome buckling system.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE this shoe
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE this shoe. Super comfy, no hot spots and lightweight. Love the single BOA feature too. Easy slip in and pull up on the BOA and slip right out. No need to mess with laces and or several velcro straps. Love Fi'zi:k products too.
customer_reviews.author: lingy69

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! I have put about $200 miles on them and hit pretty hard with a rain storm. They recovered well!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Patterson

customer_reviews.title: these shoes run small
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to have been told that the shoe runs small in size so you have to go up a size to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Conchita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes! Fit well I'm a 7.5 us and ordered 38.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FIT AND FUNCTION
customer_reviews.text: EXTEMELY HAPPY - LIGHT WEIGHT AND GREAT FIT. VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: but once I did they are a great treasure!
customer_reviews.text: It was really hard to find out my size for these shoes, but once I did they are a great treasure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Speedplay pedals
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the Speedplay Ultralight system. A very handsome shoe that fits great. I have a 10.5-11 narrow foot and usually wear a 43 in Born or other Euro shoes, and the 43 is a good fit. I was afraid it might be too small given some other reviews, but I could not have it any smaller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crangirl

customer_reviews.title: Great cycle shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great cycle shoes! I have the adapter asded so I can use these for my indoor spin classes, and the shoes work great! It takes a little while to stretch them out (they feel a little tight at first), but once stretched out they work great. Easy to get in and out of! I definitely recommend this show.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica BW

product_meta.title: Fizik R5B Donna BOA Shoe with Fuschia Trim
product_meta.description: An ill-fitting bike is a bad thing. When your ride mileage routinely measures in the triple digits, however, an ill-fitting shoe may be worse. Too tight and circulation is cut off; too loose and slippage causes painful blisters. Skiers and snowboarders have known for years: for a perfect fit almost nothing beats the Boa system. The Fizik R5 Donna Boa Womens Shoe takes advantage of the incredible precision of the Boa system while maintaining extraordinary ventilation, tough durability, and impressive light weight. The R5s closure system starts with a conventional hook-and-loop strap close to the toe for near-infinite forefoot width control. Moving up the front of the foot, the Boa Cable dial-in closure system snakes its way through four separate anchor points for complete control all the way up to the tongue. For extreme control over volume, or simply to efficiently clean the inside of the shoe, Fizik designed the tongue pad to be fully-removable. To further control slippage, Fizik has shaped the heel cup at the aft position of the shoe. This feature keeps the foot in the perfect position on hard up-strokes and while climbing out of the saddle. As a result, youre powering the pedals comfortably and efficiently. This has been further heightened by a variable stiffness sole construction. Underfoot, the R5 makes use of a carbon-reinforced nylon outsole. And while this keeps costs down, it doesnt inhibit either comfort or power transfer. In fact, the R5 retains a low stack height and a high level of rigidity. Fizik has also engineered-in trace flexibility, so the outsole drives power directly to the pedals while allowing enough movement to guarantee comfort after 80 kilometers. And on the topic of comfort, Fizik went above and beyond to make the R5 extremely breathable. The R5 features Fiziks Microtex for the support structure of the uppers and nylon mesh for the ventilation windows.
feature_bullets: Handmade- quality craftsmanship, quality materials, and amazing aesthetics set these shoes apart from any other shoe on your group ride
Boa control- the BOA control shapes each shoe individually and achieves the perfect fit, incredible comfort and the highest performance
Carbon reinforced outsole- the nylon outsole is carbon reinforced for added stiffness and better power transfer
Sculpted insole- the fiziK cycling insole and the supportive heel ensure an incredible connection to the pedals
Microtex upper- the laser perforated Microtex upper is durable and lightweight, giving you the ultimate combination of strength and comfort
